original_text: I am like the gate. Everyone who comes in through me will be safe. They will be free to come in and to go out. And they will find plenty of food.
korean_text: 내가 문이니 누구든지 나로 말미암아 들어가면 구원을 받고 또는 들어가며 나오며 꼴을 얻으리라

sentences.original_text: Everyone who comes in through me
They will be free to come in
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 들어오는 것을 자유롭게 할 수 있으며

sentences.original_text: And they will find plenty of food.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 풍부한 음식을 찾을 것입니다.
